title: Ellery Queen: Don't Look Behind You

sources.title: Ellery Queen Don't Look Behind You (1971)
sources.description: Peter Lawford, E. G. Marshall, Skye Aubrey, Stephanie Powers, Coleen Gray, Bob Hastings, Billy Sands

metadata.Plot: Detective Ellery Queen has to solve a series of murders where the victims were killed in numerically descending ages, the male victims were strangled with blue cords and the female victims with pink ones.
metadata.Writer: Frederic Dannay, Manfred Lee, Ted Leighton
metadata.Actors: Peter Lawford, Harry Morgan, E.G. Marshall
